name: Out of Mind (Pixelant)
description:
A silent girl wakes up in a mysterious world; she embarks on a journey to find her way out with the help of the dwellers of this world and unravels the mystery behind her own past.

Use the arrow keys to move around, press space in order to interact with NPCs and objects.

This game is the final project of our Computer Science degree, and is currently in development. We plan on continuing to develop it even after we graduate.

Our team is composed of three peeps, programmers and animators.

We hope you like and feel free to share your feedback in the comment section!
